To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Magmatron::

    As he stood there looking at the Holo image he learned that Bobertron had 
tried to access the classified files. The recording played and stopped him. 
It also allowed Magmatron a way into Bobertron's mind. (Much like Black 
Arachnia and Trantulas link in the show) But he didn't have time for that 
now, he had more important things to do.
    He took a step forward. The figure looked at him and frowned.
    "You haven't completed my goals yet," The image said. "You must soon, I 
will be soon free from my prison."
    "Yes, my master, I will do as you command. But there are many 
Transformers on this planet. I cannot destroy them all and keep the time line 
in order." Magmatron said. His demeanor had changed very much, whereas on his 
ship and almost everywhere else he was fearless and in total control. Here he 
was in terror.
    "Then change the course of time if you must, anything to let Cybertron be 
mine." The figure said. "You appear to be different."
    "I have assumed a beast mode and a new name. Here I am known as 
Magmatron." He said.
    "Judge, I will make you into a more powerful transformer, you must do 
whatever is nessary to assure my victory this time. I do not wish to be 
stopped by Matrix. Do what you must do." He said. 
    A light emitted from the stone wall, Magmatron was taken into it. He saw 
his controller. He flew closer to him. A red light emitted from the center of 
his master. He started to change Magmatron into a more powerful form. His 
three beast mode form was merged into the more powerful form of the Drake. 
(Drake is a sea based Dragon, they love water) He was sent through Space back 
to prehistoric Earth. Everything was clear to him now.

    (Just so everybody knows Magmatron is back, but his trip took very long, 
so you won't be hearing from him for a while. And please E-mail if you guys 
figured out who Magmatron was talking to. I gave many hints here in this 
post.)
